column6: House of M tie-in! In the Australian outback, Bruce Banner has found a peace he's never known amongst a tribe of Aborigines. But when their safety is threatened by a battle between a sect of AIM and the ruling totalitarian mutant government, the Hulk is forced to intervene in a BIG way.
column8: | penciller (cover):Andy Brase | writer:Peter David | penciller:Jorge Pereira Lucas
